info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Card and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Card with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Card with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Card with the requested ID.

204.description: Card with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Card and persists changes to storage.

put.summary: Draws a card item as done.

get.description: Find the attached User of the Card with the given ID

200.description: User attached to Card with requested ID was found
